QuestData.Title: The Mark of Vashj
QuestData.RewardText: Burn it down, $R. Burn it all down! They deserve nothing! Do you hear me! NOTHING! They must pay for what they have done. For what they continue to do.$B$BI would kill Vashj myself if I could break free of these damned bindings.$B$BOr maybe you seek to do the work of Neptulon? Her death serves both of us, soft-skin. Will you assist me in forming the sacred cudgel.
